# Guests Help Articles - Help Center Category

**SCOPE**: Help center articles for guest users
**OPTIMIZATION**: Semantic Searchability + Digestibility

## QUICK_STATS

[TOTAL_SUBDIRECTORIES]: 6
[AUDIENCE]: Guest users (renters)
[FORMAT]: Static HTML articles
[URL_PATH]: `/help-center-articles/guests/*`

---

## DIRECTORY_INTENT

[PURPOSE]: Static HTML help articles organized by guest journey stages
[PATTERN]: SEO-friendly pre-rendered HTML with shared CSS/JS
[PARENT]: app/public/help-center-articles/

---

## SUBDIRECTORY_INVENTORY

### before-booking/
[INTENT]: Pre-booking preparation and research articles
[TOPICS]: How to search, evaluating listings, comparing options

### booking/
[INTENT]: Booking process and proposal submission articles
[TOPICS]: Making proposals, rental applications, payment process

### during-stay/
[INTENT]: Articles for active guests during their rental period
[TOPICS]: Communication with hosts, house rules, issues during stay

### getting-started/
[INTENT]: Onboarding articles for new guest users
[TOPICS]: Account creation, platform overview, first steps
[KEY_ARTICLE]: how-to-get-started.html

### pricing/
[INTENT]: Pricing explanation and cost breakdown articles
[TOPICS]: How pricing works, fees, payment schedules

### trial-nights/
[INTENT]: Trial night feature explanation and guidance
[TOPICS]: What are trial nights, how to use them, policies

---

## JOURNEY_MAPPING

| Stage | Subdirectory | User State |
|-------|--------------|------------|
| Discovery | getting-started/ | New to platform |
| Research | before-booking/ | Browsing listings |
| Transaction | booking/ | Making proposal |
| Active | during-stay/ | Currently renting |
| Understanding | pricing/, trial-nights/ | Learning features |

---

## ARTICLE_TEMPLATE

All articles follow consistent structure:
- Split Lease header navigation
- Breadcrumb: All Collections > For Guests > Category > Article
- Main content with info boxes
- Sidebar with related articles
- Feedback section
